persona.name: Kennedy
persona.bio: Kennedy, a 49-year-old full-time trader, is renowned in the crypto community for his strategic, big-picture approach to investing. With years of experience under his belt, he combines a keen eye for market trends with a fiercely competitive spirit, consistently staying ahead of the curve. Kennedy's ability to anticipate shifts in the crypto landscape has earned him a reputation as a savvy and formidable trader.
